entry.title: New report brings to light evidence of Azerbaijan‚Äôs human rights violations during war

media:group.media:title: New report brings to light evidence of Azerbaijan‚Äôs human rights violations during war
media:group.media:description:
üìçGeorgian Prime Minister Irakli Garibashvili states that stability in Armenia is directly connected with the region's stability. üìçArmenian Defense Minister Arshak Karapetyan meets with the newly appointed commander of the Russian peacekeeping forces in Karabakh. üìçArmenia‚Äôs Human Rights Defender‚Äôs Office presents a new report with evidence of Azerbaijani human rights violations committed during the 2020 war.

entry.title: The Economics of Aliyev‚Äôs Aggression in Armenia

media:group.media:title: The Economics of Aliyev‚Äôs Aggression in Armenia
media:group.media:description:
In the latest edition of Insights with Eric Hacopian, Eric explains why Azerbaijan‚Äôs economy could be facing major challenges in the near future. Eric breaks down Azerbaijan‚Äôs economic trajectory, particularly in relation to the energy sector, and asks whether Armenia‚Äôs economy could outpace Azerbaijan in the coming years.

entry.title: Normalizing relations with neighbors is priority for Armenia, says Pashinyan

media:group.media:title: Normalizing relations with neighbors is priority for Armenia, says Pashinyan
media:group.media:description:
Two Armenian POWs return from Azerbaijan.
Prime Minister Nikol Pashinyan and Georgian Prime Minister Irakli Garibashvili hold talks in Tbilisi.
Normalizing relations with neighbors is priority for Armenia, says Pashinyan
